flags.text: This project guide will not appear in search results but can still be viewed by anyone!

flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
I have a range of new LED lighting kits and parts available. I have designed street lights / down lights / pool lights / commercial lighting kits as well.

Keep a lookout as I will be bringing out more LED lighting kits from my design range. Now you can build up your own LED lights, and if you what to learn about LEDs then my new LED kits should do the job! They are ideal for schools and clubs or someone who just wants to change to LED lighting in their home or business.

Whatever the case may be I am available any time to help out, so if you need a kit or LED parts then let me know by email (eyecatchu@yahoo.com.au) or by Mob: 0408458645.
guide.introduction_rendered:
I have a range of new LED lighting kits and parts available. I have designed street lights / down lights / pool lights / commercial lighting kits as well.

Keep a lookout as I will be bringing out more LED lighting kits from my design range. Now you can build up your own LED lights, and if you what to learn about LEDs then my new LED kits should do the job! They are ideal for schools and clubs or someone who just wants to change to LED lighting in their home or business.

Whatever the case may be I am available any time to help out, so if you need a kit or LED parts then let me know by email (eyecatchu@yahoo.com.au) or by Mob: 0408458645.

lines.text: Before starting this kit lay out components and check parts list as follows: 1 x PCB / Hook up wire lead / 1 x 470 ohms resistor / 3 x 5mm LED's
lines.text_raw: Before starting this kit lay out components and check parts list as follows: 1 x PCB / Hook up wire lead / 1 x 470 ohms resistor / 3 x 5mm LED's

lines.text: Insert resistor into PCB any way round will do.
lines.text_raw: Insert resistor into PCB any way round will do.

lines.text: Solder the LED onto the PCB.          Solder this end to the + side (long leg) of the PCB which is marked.
lines.text_raw: Solder the LED onto the PCB.          Solder this end to the + side (long leg) of the PCB which is marked.

lines.text: NOTE:   Make sure the LED is solder the correct way round on the PCB , now if you look very closely at the LED one end has a short leg and a long leg this is the positive + end.
lines.text_raw: NOTE:   Make sure the LED is solder the correct way round on the PCB , now if you look very closely at the LED one end has a short leg and a long leg this is the positive + end.

lines.text: WARNING: LEDs ARE STACTIC SENSITIVE SO YOU MUST WEAR A UNTI STATIC WRISTBAND WHICH IS CONNECTED TO EARTH.
lines.text_raw: WARNING: LEDs ARE STACTIC SENSITIVE SO YOU MUST WEAR A UNTI STATIC WRISTBAND WHICH IS CONNECTED TO EARTH.

lines.text: NOTE:  (We can supply a static mat kits)
lines.text_raw: NOTE:  (We can supply a static mat kits)

lines.text: PCB complete with resistor and LED's.
lines.text_raw: PCB complete with resistor and LED's.

lines.text: Solder on power wire lead with red wire in centre.
lines.text_raw: Solder on power wire lead with red wire in centre.

lines.text: Now contact up to a 12V DC power supply.
lines.text_raw: Now contact up to a 12V DC power supply.

guide.summary:
LED light kit with 3 x 5mm LED's

Price AUD $6.50. Complete kit.  
Shipping cost is extra.   
Discount on bulk (email us).
guide.title: 3 x LED Kit
